title: Connie Ferguson shares picture of her super fit 83-year-old dad
text:
Connie Ferguson shares picture of her super fit 83-year-old dad share this

Cape Town - Local actress and businesswoman, Connie Ferguson’s father might just have the secret to not aging – staying active!

It’s often said that there is nothing that can ever separate a daughter from her daddy’s love, the bond is too strong. Connie and her dad are proof.

Taking to Instagram to celebrate her father as her Man Crush Monday (#MCM), the executive producer posted two pictures of her father. One from a few years ago when he was younger, and a more recent one.

In both pictures, Connie’s dad, Tuelo Masilo, is in his sport gear, clearly ready for action. The recent picture sees the 83-year-old wearing a white karate uniform with a black belt, surrounded by certificates and trophies, like a true master!

READ MORE: Connie Ferguson’s moving tribute to her late mom

Connie captioned her post:

“My #MCM today is this young man who just happens to be my father, Sensei Fish Tuelo Masilo! At age 83, with all the niggles that naturally come with old age, he’s still as active as ever!???? Known as the “Black Cat” in his boxing days back in the 60’s and 70’s, his love for sports, especially Karate and Boxing, is what keeps him young at heart and a joy to be around! He has instilled in me the discipline and innate love for physical activity! #iammyfatherslegacy. I love you SENSEI! [sic]”

description: Connie Ferguson’s father might just have the secret to not aging – staying active!.
